name: OakDust - The adventure in Wyld
description:
Welcome gamer!

This game was made by a team of two for the GMTK 2021 game jam.  Loney89 and myself. 

Lore

You are playing Wynnstan the tree spirit, guardian of the forest Wyld. After an attack by the evil witches a group of Oakdusts find themselves lost in the forest. Collect and use the Oakdust spirits and bring them back to their cozy protected encampment. 

Controls

Moving: WASD

Jump: Spacebar 

Collect: Collect the Oakdusts by moving near them.

Throwing: Aim with mouse cursor, throw with Left click

Recall: Left click after throwing will cause Oakdust to fly back and push you in the oppisite direction.
